alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; Lower Plaquemines; Lower Terrebonne; Upper Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 25 at 3:26AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Terrebonne, southeastern Lafourche, central Jefferson and western Plaquemines Parishes through 400 AM CST... At 325 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing funnel clouds over Galliano, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...If a funnel cloud briefly touches down, minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Larose, Cut Off, Galliano and Golden Meadow. FUNNEL CLOUDS...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; Lower Plaquemines; Lower Terrebonne; Upper Lafourche
